text: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

translation.en: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing
translation.id: Allah telah menyediakan azab yang sangat keras bagi mereka. Sungguh, betapa buruknya apa yang telah mereka kerjakan
